# Overview

We need a bar plot of counts per year for a search with keywords "Mendelian randomization".

```{r, eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github("akshaynagpal/RgScholar")
```

```{r}
RgScholar::google_Scholar(user_query = "mendelian randomization", year_low = 2021)
```
